Npc0043:
ï¿½It seems like every bakery has been making lucky sandwiches these days.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½They're kind of like fortune cookies, except you can win stuff.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Oh yeah, and it's a sandwich.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Okay, so maybe it's not like a fortune cookie.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Anyway, the best thing that can happen is ï¿½recover PP.ï¿½[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I just wish I knew what ï¿½PPï¿½ was...[HALT][END]
